name: Catatan Belajar #02 - Hanging for The Revelation
description:
Hang on to any belief is not always wrong if what we believe is morally good.

Having a condition that forcing us to do acrobatics up to imagine could fly. Some relying on it pass by praying, some by reading the reality.

He promised he would come. If only we were to pursue it, it would be so close that we could only reach for it.

"Catatan Belajar" or "Study Notes" is a project to record the studied things as I am currently studying my religion again.
